answers.answer: You might want to get a second opinion. I've never heard of this being a male only problem. Of course I'm not a Dr and I could be wrong. What did her say was the treatment for it?  Remar

question: i have shadowing in my left eye, i went to the specialist  he said i have a blister in my eye. the cause he told me was either from steroids or being male? i dont take steroids and never have so i guess being a male is the only answer?? i asked if diabetes is any cause due to it being in the family he said " being a male!" is that the only reason ?
title: blister in the eye ball
